params.custodyAddress: The address to check the signature of.
params.fid: The fid to check the signature of.

idOf(address).notice: Maps each address to an fid, or zero if it does not own an fid.

verifyFidSignature(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Verify that a signature was produced by the custody address that owns an fid.
